files.description: Command-line script that creates and maintains a single source-of-truth progress ledger (JSON/CSV) by updating per-goal counts, recording per-cycle snapshots, and printing current active goals for each cycle to resolve the 'ACTUALLY PURSUED: 0' inconsistency.

missionDescription: Implement a minimal tracking system to resolve the 'ACTUALLY PURSUED: 0' inconsistency: create a single source-of-truth progress ledger (e.g., /outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json or .csv) plus a small script that updates counts per goal and lists current active goals for each cycle.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Progress is currently not measurable or auditable; the portfolio shows priority goals but tracking inconsistencies prevent execution management and repeatable progress reporting.
